inclusion.criterion: Scheduled for continuing care at the University of Illinois at Chicago Sickle Cell Clinic
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Experienced a moderate to severe level of pain (at least 3 on 0 to 10 scale) related to the SCD within the 12 months prior to study entry
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Had a emergency department visit or hospitalization within the 2 years prior to study entry
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Physically unable to complete study questionnaire
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of sickle cell crises since childhood and was treated with oxycodone which was not beneficial. He is afebrile within normal blood pressure.
